website_summaries.verdict: On the smaller size of upright freezers, this one is compact yet reasonably room for a small model. Ideal for dorm or apartment living.
pros: The stainless steel exterior looks upscale compared to other upright freezers
The included cylinder lock and keys keeps food safe from unwanted intruders
cons: The smaller 2.1 cubic-foot interior may be inadequate for people looking for a mid-size freezer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! Just what I need! It's great for one person, it actually stores more food than expected!
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, works great.
customer_reviews.text: Like many others, my freezer arrived dented. I contacted Amazon and customer service was great. They gave me a discount for the item being damaged. I let the freezer set overnight before plugging it in. The freezer works great. Within a hour it was down to zero. I have the thermostat set midway and it stays at -10 F. It's quiet with just a low humm. I bought this for our Motor home and wasn't certain if it would be big enough and considered the 2.1 cu ft model. It holds more than I thought. I'm glad we purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: Guy B.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Locked with the keys inside
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived locked with the keys inside, so I am unable to use it . The company wrote "We're sorry to hear your unit arrived without its designated keys." Then they wrote "We are sorry to hear of your dissatisfaction with our company. Due to unforeseen circumstances, we are simply unable to ship out a set of replacement keys. Please let us know in the event further assistance is required."
customer_reviews.author: Susan Smith

customer_reviews.title: We purchased this unit to fit in the basement compartment ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this unit to fit in the basement compartment of a motor coach. It arrived in flawless condition and was operated " in home" for a month , prior to installation into the coach. It has traveled around the US in varied ambient climates and has performed perfectly thus far .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME FREEZER
customer_reviews.text: This freezer is amazing. I keep it on the LOWEST setting of "1" and everything is frozen solid. There is a lot of room in it too. I highly recommend it. The door action is very well made and stays secure very well when closed. I ditched my large refrigerator and now use this and a small regular refrigerator and i'm saving on electric and keep fresher food in the house. Also, I don't buy things I don't need, I just buy for the week.
customer_reviews.author: D. Green

customer_reviews.title: Open compressor/motor.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size. My fridge freezer doesn't have much room. I just received the 2nd one. The first one I ordered came damaged on the corners similar to other reviews. My big question is why there isn't a cover on the compressor/motor in the back. It seems dangerous to have it open where dust and dirt could get in it. Or a grandchild could stick a finger in it. I'd also be afraid to butt it up against a wall, as the booklet says to leave 4" space around it. What's the deal with that?
customer_reviews.author: cbible

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this. Within less than 2 weeks after plugging in this freezer, it stopped cooling completely. Had to throw all of the food away in the freezer. I followed the manual's instructions when setting up and it just stopped working. Even though it was under warranty, the company says that they only provide warranty repair service if you bring the freezer into their California offices. Since I live on the East Coast, that obviously does not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little freezer. It's in my RV right next to the TV. So quiet I wasn't sure it was working - I think the key is to level it very well. Door swing switch is easy, very little frost buildup and uses very little electricity (Someone calculated it out at about 1.5 amp draw and I believe it). I have it on a 15amp circuit with my whole entertainment center and it hasn't tripped the breaker even when I plug the vacuum into the same circuit. Holds allot more than you might think and doesn't have to kick on very often once the temp settles. I think I have about 2 whole deer crammed in there.
customer_reviews.author: NHcarpenter

customer_reviews.title: Good once I finally got one that wasn't severely damaged in transit!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this specifically to store breast milk since all those pouches were overtaking our regular freezer! It works great and I like it, but the only thing that sucked was that I had to get it replaced twice because they arrived damaged! This one was damaged too, but not as bad, so I kept it. The postal people/UPS people must hate me since we live upstairs :(
customer_reviews.author: mamabearx2

customer_reviews.title: This is really a nice product. I have limited space and a small ...
customer_reviews.text: This is really a nice product. I have limited space and a small main fridge/freezer that doesn't allow me to buy anything in quantity. This allows me to buy at the clubs again and save money. The freezer is very cold, runs very quietly, energy star rated to cost you $26 a year in electricity.
customer_reviews.author: RonSchon

customer_reviews.title: Received used item! Can't return. Yay.
customer_reviews.text: 1) Great size freezer. 2) But it's USED I should've listened to the other reviews about receiving used fridges-- this is refurbished at best. Divots inside that were "patched" with some cheap paint, many scratch mark on the shelf tracks (but not the tracks where the shelves were when they arrived), and some weird black marks on the door. And the outside is so scuffed and the rubber door trim is filthy. There is no way this is new. Of course during these crazy times Amazon is not allowing this to be returned and there are no customers service reps available. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: ltny

customer_reviews.title: Item has stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Bought in Sept, 2019. Was told warranty was for 1 year. Has stopped working. Have ask me to send photos, temperature setting before putting food in, temperature of room, is the item running with a hum. Do not not buy this item. Should still be working. A lot of do nots before sending info.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Freezer does not work
customer_reviews.text: There saying that I cannot return it. Do not buy product.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: This broke in less than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: It just completely stopped working after 2 months. I bought it to store my baby's breast milk but THANK GOD I never used it for that or I'd have lost everything! Instead I just lost probably $200 worth of food. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa M.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I was unboxing my freezer and that how it was delivered...
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Peixoto

customer_reviews.title: This freezer needs 6" clearance on sides and back
customer_reviews.text: Just to let potential buyers know- Amazon advertises this unit as "designed with a flush back, allowing it to fit cleanly against the wall or into corners"- I just spoke to Whynter customer service and they said that is not true and they are working with Amazon ti update that info. The unit needs 6" on sides and back for clearance.
customer_reviews.author: wingnut

customer_reviews.title: Junk Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Bought in March to help stock food during pandemic. Already died. Trash!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Never Worked
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered on time with no damage to the box or freezer. Let it sit upright for 4 hours as per the instructions before connecting to a known working electric outlet on a perfectly level solid surface with ample clearance. After 20 hours the internal temperature was 80°f. I adjusted the temperature control to just below the maximum as per the instructions. It never made a noise or came on. Amazon customer service refunded my money within the hour. Returning the freezer was not required so I called an appliance repair shop to see if they could fix it, they said it was better to junk it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry and Sue

customer_reviews.title: It's chilling like a Villan!
customer_reviews.text: Easy peazy set up, delivery was fast... arrived in perfect condition exactly when they said it would. The cooling mechanism on each shelf is awesome, it got up to temp very quickly ... It's only been a day but it's going well. Instructions were clelar and surprisingly well written! Never heard of this brand before but I am really happy with it. I looked up similar products from other more popular manufacturers and needed to keep in budget under $300. Yes, it is not exceptional quality materials... What else? My BF just said "It's nice to be able to lock up your meat!" Whatever that means :p Best part... I can see all my stuff in the fridge now.
customer_reviews.author: BlissedOutGeek

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The freezer arrived smashed in the top right corner and dented in the left side. Ughhh now what?
customer_reviews.author: Denise Neumann

customer_reviews.title: Just Exactly What We Were Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: This little freezer is awesome! While it was not necessarily recommended to do so, we put it down in belly of our motorhome and it works great there to store the frozen things you don't need to access every day. The delivery was unbelievable - it came a couple of days earlier than estimated and the packaging was excellent. The little freezer is just exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.author: Sid L

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS POS
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working less than a month after I received it. It destroyed everything inside it.
customer_reviews.author: Ambariffic

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Broke within a few weeks currently in an email chain with their customer service department. They keep asking me to check this or check that.
customer_reviews.author: alison cobb

customer_reviews.title: //[adequate space for frozen food for one vegetarian for time span of a month,,,];
customer_reviews.text: //[fiLLs up quickLy, and performs weLL,,,Lowest setting creates rock soLid frozen food,,,finaLLy have a proper pLace to store frozen foods,,,thank you,,, ,,, as a vegetarian,,,has enough space to store enough frozen vegetarian LightLife sausages[six packs of eight], two packs of four LightLife smart sausages, three boxes of vegetabLe entree vegetarian items, two packs of sixteen sLices of cheese[not yet vegan,,,], a carton of soya tofu[frozen tofu is a menu item in china], a container of Leftovers, and some frozen fresh fruit,,,forgot to snap a photo,,,this amount of frozen food can be adequate for one person over a month time span,,,];
customer_reviews.author: aLbert

customer_reviews.title: ... milk a few months ago and it is doing great. Fits under the lowest shelf in our pantry ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for storing breast milk a few months ago and it is doing great. Fits under the lowest shelf in our pantry which was hard to find and I have been able to keep adding to my backstock of frozen milk without taking over our primary freezer. I used an external thermometer to make sure the temp was cold enough and it has consistently stayed below 0 degrees F since I bought it and turned it on.
customer_reviews.author: Pasitch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for limited  freezer requirements
customer_reviews.text: Nifty small auxiliary freezer. I use it for baking during the holidays. Worked right away and initial freeze overnight. ( note- it says let sit 4 hrs before plugging in, which i did and all was well). It weighs about 40 lbs. note for singles who have to move this to its “home” , I dragged it FIRST by its container strips ( before unpacking it). It slid easily through my house to the garage. Kept me from having to lift it... I am very pleased with this item
customer_reviews.author: S BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 3 weeks, almost lost all of my meat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this freezer to store venison three weeks ago. It was not packaged well but worked perfectly for the first three weeks. It started making an odd sound yesterday afternoon. When I woke up this morning it was in a pool of blood. Another few hours and I would have lost all of my meat. I wish I would have read the other 1 star reviews. This seems to be common.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little freezer for the $200 range
customer_reviews.text: its a -10*F freezer and its been working like a champ for almost 6 months at this point. When I transfer stuff into the fancy freezer it usually reads less than zero right away which leads me to believe its max setting is indeed around the -10F mark.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Arrived heavily damaged
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived severely damaged. The shipping container appeared intact, so the product may have been loaded with damage right at the manufacturing plant. I notified the manufacturer and was stunned when they wrote back that they would do nothing. I attached photos of the damage, the invoice from Amazon, and explained clearly that I cannot return this item so as to get Amazon's exchange or refund. 1) I am in quarantine, 2) I can't lift the item, and 3) there is no way that the manufacturer could resell this item anyway. I attempted to resolve this kindly with the manufacturer, but now it seems as though writing a review is my only recourse. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Nice little freezer but VERY NOISY
customer_reviews.text: As some people noticed in their reviews, this freezer has an annoying humming/buzzing sound. We have a large fridge and it makes noise that is not exactly like calming waves of the ocean, but I got used to it. But now I cannot stay too long in the kitchen because this humming noise of the freezer is so unpleasant. If I were able to put it to a basement or a garage, that would make a difference. If you are sensitive to such buzzing noise as I am, look for something else. I am not sure if there are freezers that are very quiet, but I do not like the noise of this one.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for a 3.0 cu feet freezer
customer_reviews.text: Just a perfect size, not too big and not too small. An excellent and energy efficient standing freezer. Paid a little bit more b/c it was a standing freezer rather than one of those chest freezers. Overall, 5/5 stars and very quiet & energy efficient. I saw from other reviews that this lockable freezer is the perfect size for the RV. Additionally, it's lockable too to protect all your freezer valuables.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: This freezer is so quiet I had to feel the motor to make sure it was on. It got cold quickly and stayed that way.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: work great, very quiet
customer_reviews.text: At first it was great, this thing is very quiet. i just had it for a year. i bought it on august 27 , 2017 and now its sep 2nd, 2018. This thing already worked up. i only have it on level 1 and the snow build up so much inside. ( and this been happen a long time already not just now) . and today it wasn't even on, i notice cause my ice cube not even making. This really suck :(
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Good quality too and holds a lot of stuff
customer_reviews.text: Wow so much bigger than we thought. Good quality too and holds a lot of stuff. We laughed at the cute little ice tray that came with it. Packaged well with no damage to the freezer. Gets cold in a hurry.Just hope it lasts because we really like it.
customer_reviews.author: BEAUTYMISTI

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dented but cools quickly
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Packed well (double boxed) but still had a decent dent in the top panel when unboxed. Suggests dent occurred in initial packing and not in shipping (no apparent external shipping damage). Occasional condenser vibration can be annoying. Inconvenient temp setting dial Pros: Compact size. Cooled quickly to minus 15 degrees (top shelf) in less than two hours. Easy to level. Long power cord.
customer_reviews.author: ehm1217

customer_reviews.title: Died after 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: buyee beware. this freezer died after 4 months of normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Mbizzy

customer_reviews.title: this thing rocks.
customer_reviews.text: love this thing so far. 6 months in and works unbelievable. have ice in 30mins. can even over freeze. has a lock so dang kids cant steal your icecream!
customer_reviews.author: BigCrab

customer_reviews.title: freezer review ONLY- DOD
customer_reviews.text: Ordered first freezer (2.1 cu ft)-- DEAD on delivery! delivery service was good/5+, but the freezer does not work - power went on for a few minutes or hours, then dead on day one. thankfully, Amazon agreed to offer refund or replacement. Ordered 2nd freezer (1.1 cu ft) -- This one works and interior gets very cold pretty fast (have only been in use for 1 day so far). Sound is very mild (Good!). Thank you Amazon for your reliable service!!!
customer_reviews.author: AmaShopper

customer_reviews.title: Answer to COVID-19
customer_reviews.text: Closed a food service at mall, donated most of the food, but still saved some for home. Here is how these little freezers fit under an IKEA table and hold a lot of chicken. Think they are small enough to fit in small location.
customer_reviews.author: Luwen

customer_reviews.title: Great little freezer, dented external :(
customer_reviews.text: So far so good as far as freezing food and ice, but very disappointed in how the product was delivered. I don’t know if it was enroute while being shipped or if it was the movement on the shipment van to my house, but there are several dents on the bottom sides of this fridge. It seems to work fine so far but I am quite upset that the item is athletically damaged (again this is only the first day of use). If it appears that the item is not going to function properly, I will update my review. I did buy the warranty associated with this product as well.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Good freezer but runs hot
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this freezer for extra space to store my food because of the corona virus. I placed it in my pantry. It keeps the food extra cold however the top of this freezer gets very hot.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: 🤜🏼🤛🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: It may be premature because it was delivered three days ago. So far, I couldn't be more pleased. I've needed a compact freezer for years because older model and cheap refrigerator freezers are typically tiny. I can't give a rating for energy efficiency after only three days. I can attest to how cold it is, the food is solidly frozen, much better than this frig freezer. It's aesthetically pleasing and doesn't require much space.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy W.

customer_reviews.title: Whynter Service is Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a few months and then stopped working. Reached out to Whynter and they were unresponsive and unconcerned about my issues with the freezer. Finally, they just stopped responding to my inquiries. Choose a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor, low quality sticker placement
customer_reviews.text: Probably a decent freezer but companies that vandalize their own products with cheap paper stickers really do deserve to fail. I would have happily paid $0.25 more for a vinyl sticker. The time I’ll have to spend to remove that cheap adhesive is an utter waste.

customer_reviews.title: Product Highly Questionable
customer_reviews.text: This was an "Amazon Choice" item; unit arrived damaged; top back left corner dented and a copper line was bent/ crimped. Amazon initially had it as non-returnable; contacted the manufacturer Whynter, as per Amazon instructions on site, but they did not respond. Had to call Amazon to get resolution and cost was fully refunded. Packaging was light...just a bottom under the unit with cardboard around it, then a box without a bottom went over the top...held together with plastic straps. Box basically disintegrated after shipping straps were removed so not usable for any type of return. Unit is functioning, for now; runs completely silent.
customer_reviews.author: Terese King

customer_reviews.title: Defective, now I need to return a bulky online shipment?
customer_reviews.text: I received this freezer today, and chose it in part because of the reviews by other customers. It was dead-on-arrival. The plug was bent, and when I tried to straighten it out and plug it into an outlet, absolutely nothing. Think hard about buying a big bulky appliance -- even something the side of a mini-fridge -- online. The packaging falls apart when you unpack it, and how am I supposed to return this when society is on lockdown? Absolutely awful, and a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: LeBron Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about this freezer but it’s amazing!! The freezer under our fridge stopped working at the worst time during this pandemic when we need to store food! So glad we found this freezer, it works very well, freezes things so quickly, and it has more space than we would’ve expected. Holds a good amount of meat packages, ice trays, and some produce. It has a slight hum but that’s expected. We are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great small freezer
customer_reviews.text: this little freezer ia about the width of a WALKER and a few inches taller. very qouiet. i also purchased the two freezer ice prevention mats to keep the ice down. it fits very well in a small living room closet and allows more storage from a regular kitchen freezer. it has two shelves and a drawere. GREAT FOR TWO PEOPLE. DELIVERED WITH NO DAMAGE / VERY QUIET QUICKER DELIVERY THAT RETAIL STORES/
customer_reviews.author: S. brown

customer_reviews.title: The perfect little freezer!
customer_reviews.text: I needed another freezer to store the extra food I've had to buy due to Covid. I didn't have space for a large freezer so this is perfect. It was super easy to assemble - the box came already pre-cut so all I had to put the freezer in place, lift the box, and plugged it in. It's quiet for the most part; but every now and then, the motor will turn on and it gets a little loud. But it's only temporary. Most importantly though, it freezes my food!
customer_reviews.author: Traci D.

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed it for! the size is a bit of a struggle for my home... but um certain that's mostly a personal issue. I suffer migraines so this is intended for my excessive amount of cold packs that are almost always being rotated out, and the space is perfect. the temperature is perfect. my husband is an extremely light sleeper so we have to keep it in a different room, but I dont notice the noise much if at all.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna Masters

customer_reviews.title: Dented and scuffed up but works great.
customer_reviews.text: Came in dented and scuffed-up up on one side, unfortunately it's the side that will be exposed. Overall got to the correct temperature and works great though.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great price...does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my business to store ice cream sandwiches. Small commercial merchandising freezers are $500-$700. Granted my customers can not see the product but it keeps everything frozen. The door shuts tightly with ease. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne E

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly silent in small studio apartment
customer_reviews.text: Did a deep search for small freezer in case of Covid resurgence in NYC. Live in a tiny studio apartment in East Village and needed a silent freezer since I'll be sleeping right next to it. So pleased! Can't even tell it's running. Not a sound! Though it's too big for my tiny space, I'm very glad I opted for the 3.0 size. Filled it up immediately. Feel much safer now.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S

customer_reviews.title: Fairly rough ride from California to Oklahoma
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on schedule, unpacked it and discovered that it was dented on both sides above the condenser. This indent made it impossible to level. Before I returned it, I thought I would plug it in and see if it still worked. The dents appear to be a giant claw was used or misused to move the freezer in warehouse, as there wasn't any indication that the outer box was mishandled to cause such a dent. It does work and keeps a constant temperature of '0' on the 3 setting. This is used for additional food storage other than my refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Lanna

customer_reviews.title: Shipped damaged.Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged as I expected it would be. BOX WAS OK BUT FREEZER DENTED.SO I assume it was packaged with damage.I receive packages at a 150 unit housing every day and see this all the time order at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: tlgnomad rver

customer_reviews.title: Good so far, quiet, lots of space
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for a month but working well so far. It is very quiet, it have it right next to my bed and have no problem sleeping. You can store a surprising amount of stuff in it. It has more cold settings that it needs, and all of them are freezing, so I just set mine to the second setting to keep it from running the compressor more often.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: The freezer is a great size for my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: The freezer is a great size for my kitchen, runs quietly and cooled quickly when turned on. However, it arrived damaged- and it was not due to shipping as the box was undamaged. After unpacking- the top of the freezer was scratched and the left rear corner extensively dented. From all indications the freezer was damaged before it was boxed and shipped. Very disappointed as this purchased was not cheap!!
customer_reviews.author: Lyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Like others, mine also arrived with some minor cosmetic damage but nothing significant and still seems to work fine. I bought a freezer thermometer and alarm because I'm planning to store breastmilk and frozen baby food puree in it. Can't comment on longevity of the freezer as I've only had it for 2 days but it does seem to work well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Livia

customer_reviews.title: Noisy. Works, but it is noisy.
customer_reviews.text: It's compact, the temperature is stable, decent design. But be sure you can locate it in a place where you don't have to hear it all the time, such as a garage, basement or something like that. Do not put it in your kitchen or a place where your family hangs out. After a while it gets annoying. Besides that, no other complain so far.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer21

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious and amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I looooove this freezer. I’m kicking myself, wondering why didn’t I get it sooner. It’s bigger than I thought it would be but it’s still light enough to carry. My ice freezes so fast and my meats freeze well also. The only tiny issue is the removable tray at the bottom.. I don’t see the point in it but I don’t care because this freezer is great. Also, they gave me a free mini ice tray which does come in handy!!
customer_reviews.author: asrauch

customer_reviews.title: Whynter 2.1 freezer
customer_reviews.text: I've always been happy with Whynter products,, (air conditioner still running after 4 years) so hoping for the best on this 2.1 Freezer. No damage upon delivery, but I DID order a freezer thermometer to make sure it's running at its best.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Good for extra space
customer_reviews.text: Great freezer for small spaces. Functions well and noise is minimal. Four stars overall because the compressor line was slightly crimped due to poor handling during delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Whiskey Killer

customer_reviews.title: Defective product and no customer service
customer_reviews.text: This freezer was defective. It could not freeze an ice tray. In spite of repeated attempts to reach them, I was not successful. One of the coils was malformed and damaged. I tried for weeks to get a response. It is totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Hadley

customer_reviews.title: Keeps items frozen
customer_reviews.text: This freezer does what it is supposed to do. We purchased it to keep ice in it from our ice maker that turns the ice to water if it sits there. It is a great little freezer.
customer_reviews.author: S. Osbeck

customer_reviews.title: So far a good freezer
customer_reviews.text: originally bought the Igloo but it wouldnt stay cold, so had to return it,,had shoulder surgery and had to buy alot of frozen dinners pre surgery so this freezer so far is working great compared to other. I was gonna buy this one first but cost more, I should have listened to myself. its made so much better, Altho it too came with a dent on top back.this was packed alittle better. ,last one had big dent in it,. It didnt come with registration so I wonder if this was a returned one, the other one surely must have been
customer_reviews.author: MARC GRADY

customer_reviews.title: More than satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Received this product one day ahead of scheduled delivery. Update: 8/16/20 - It fit perfectly into the space I prepared and it runs quiet and efficiently. I can not be more pleased with this purchase. The freezer holds it temperature extremely well. It is very quiet. Even when someone is sleeping in the rood they can not hear the freezer
customer_reviews.author: Bob Furia

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 30 days
customer_reviews.text: This piece of garbage quit working in 30 days. Too much hassle to return so I'll have garbage company take it to the dump. China strike again!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: It works but....
customer_reviews.text: Freezes well but I overlooked that It's not frost free, very annoying to have to keep cleaning frost. Again, works great and freezes ice cream quickly, along with popsicles. Very quiet running.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great unit, good price. capacity
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and capacity. Does the job. I use frozen dog food so it's perfect. Not self defrosting, but if temp adjusted correctly doesn't build up fast. At first I had it too cold & got snow cone buildup over bite. Only complaint is temp adjustment knob is on back at bottom, so hard to see and must pull it away from wall to adjust. But once set it's ok
customer_reviews.author: JKS

customer_reviews.title: Love my compact freezer!!
customer_reviews.text: This for me is the ideal "overflow" freezer to my large kitchen refrigerator/freezer. I am able to purchase extra meats and other items to stock up. It is compact but has lots of space, and is very quiet, actually can barely hear a hum. I am very pleased with this purchase and highly recommend. Size specifications fit perfectly in my space.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia C.

customer_reviews.title: It was one of the biggest ones I could find at the best price and I am so glad we purchase this.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mini freezer to go in the basement since our refrigerator does not have a lot of freezer space. This freezer is quiet and works perfectly. I have not noticed any changes in our electric bill. It was one of the biggest ones I could find at the best price and I am so glad we purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Gale Lewandowski

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I'd never heard of this brand, but it was available and the price was right so thought I'd try it. It sits well in a small space and is pretty quiet. I have the hinge side up against a wall and the door opens fine. Great for extra meat or ice cream. The lock works, but isn't very tight locking (there is room to wiggle the door slightly open) - but would keep someone out. Good cord length and the unit was packed well. We have it on a shelf in our laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: jrziggy

customer_reviews.title: Did he read delivery directions, or not get them?
customer_reviews.text: I don't know yet. Its still sitting on the front porch. It may go back unless I can get my son to come over and help me move it this weekend. "Superman" has been exposed to Kryptonite (I just turned 76, have arthritis, and failed back surgery!) DIRECTIONS: I have a double-wide driveway. Drive down to the back. This will eventually go to the basement. Put it by the back door. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frost build-up
customer_reviews.text: The frost build up around the door especially the left hand side by the hinges makes this almost unusable. I have adjusted the temp settings and checked the seal. No luck
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good basic freezer at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Like many people had mentioned ,the unit arrived with a couple of small dings, but its doesn't bother how the unit works and dings are part of life. I was pleasantly surprised how much i can put in the freezer and the bottom drawer is fantastic it can hold 7lbs of fish in the drawer. Everything stays really frozen solid. A slight smell emanated from it for a week or so but wears off.
customer_reviews.author: F. K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice small Freezer!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this freezer. It is quiet and keeps everything frozen solid. A great size for a small amount of extra space. The delivery was fast too...got it when promised..6am.on my front porch.!
customer_reviews.author: JULIE RUFFO

customer_reviews.title: This unit has a lot of interior room for a small sized freezer!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this freezer. It's small enough to take up a small corner of a clothes closet, which is great because I live in a studio apartment and already have a mid-sized refrigerator in my kitchen. I have filled it with steaks, chickens, frozen pizzas, cheese, butter, and bacon. It came packaged beautifully and had no damage. It matches my Magic Chef mid-sized refrigerator which also has a small freezer on it. I am set! VERY happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: George Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought (after I unpacked it) looked like it had been dropped from a forklift, while the packaging didn’t. I returned that to Amazon via UPS. Then I received a replacement. There are broken/missing feet/pads on the bottom and it wobbles and leans at angle. The pads on the bottom are different and do not match. It hums louder than my regular large fridge/freezer. I would not recommend this freezer at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective
customer_reviews.text: This freezer did not work. We plugged it in and did not work. We followed all operating instructions on the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Sam H

customer_reviews.title: It stopped working after two weeks
customer_reviews.text: This freezer stopped working after ten days. Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Love this little freezer!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little freezer! It’s perfect for our small apartment and tucks away nicely. Keeps our items frozen and is very quiet. I really don’t even hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Great Freezer!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by being honest, at first I was so skeptical about the size and if this freezer would have enough space for the meats i needed to keep frozen. I read the reviews and decided to give it a try and to my surprise OMG this freezer is definitely spacious!! It is quiet, convenient and larger than I had expected. I am glad I brought this freezer and it arrived on time with NO DELAY!! If you’re looking for a good freezer this is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Great little freezer
customer_reviews.text: This freezer is very nice looking and the perfect size for what I need. I like that it opens in the front so you don't have to dig through stuff that's at the bottom. It is also very quiet. I use it to store homemade bone broth and overflow from the freezer attached to the fridge. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it's not self-defrosting.
customer_reviews.author: JJB335

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with dent in rear, top right corner, packaging intact
customer_reviews.text: Just received the freezer. Packing was intact (in two boxes with foam board) but found the top, rear right corner had been dented (assuming it happened pre-packaging, since packaging was intact). A bit chuffed because the description didn’t say it was cosmetically damaged. The rest looks fine. I’m sure it will work without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: As has been stated by others BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: Received today..the outside of the freezer is damaged. The right side is dented as well as the left side. Top is scratched Very poor presentation out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Queen Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this freezer ... I got it for my Breastmilk ... Today is my 1st day with it . Perfect size
customer_reviews.author: Latara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a small space. Side by side they are about 35”. I bought these for a vacation home to store bait and ice alto save space in our regular freezer. Figured 3cu ft would be two small, 4 is just right. Cooled down very quickly and was able to transfer frozen goods in an hour.
customer_reviews.author: daniel Potter

customer_reviews.title: Everything we need, want, and can use.  Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Our GE side by side freezer/ refrigerator less than 1 year old, suddenly stopped working. Needed affordable freezer while waiting to have GE repairs This freezer arrived in two days. Perfect condition Just what we need
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer.

customer_reviews.title: Not Packaged Secure Enough
customer_reviews.text: The freezer arrived today damaged in a damaged box. Has a gash in the side about the size of a half dollar. Still seems to work. Not paying or taking the time to ship it back as I live on a island. I’ll just use it as is.
customer_reviews.author: Janet In Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far
customer_reviews.text: Because of the current shortage, had a 3 week delivery delay known from the start. Actually delivered slightly early, Saturday instead of Monday. Other than possibly 1 tiny ding (barely noticeable) on one side, arrived in good shape. It actually had 2 layers of cardboard box to protect it. Took about 24 hours and a little fiddling with the temperature dial, but has now been keeping a nice cold temperature. It does make some minor noises, but overall actually very quiet. Overall, happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beth P

customer_reviews.title: So far....
customer_reviews.text: I received it in 2 days, yeah Prime! Received it in perfect condition and fired it up later that night and added frost free pads to shelves and by morning we had an ice box... I have a temp gauge coming and I'll report on temps, but So far, so good! 9/6/18 - Temp gauge says -11f at all locations in freezer! I also must add that it is NOT as large as some people have inferred. I would compare the 3.0 cu. ft size. to the same freezer size of a top freezer in a frig/freezer combo where the freezer is on top... no complaints yet and So far so good...
customer_reviews.author: iNetMANN

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price when amazon ships without damage
customer_reviews.text: The freezer works well for the price. You can hear the compressor turn on from 100ft away (if you have an open floor plan). My freezer arrived with dents and amazon let me have it free so I kept it. Hopefully, they can do a better job getting these large items delivered without damage in the future.
customer_reviews.author: steven7600

customer_reviews.title: No insulation
customer_reviews.text: Good little freezer but it has no insulation. In a powet outage, you need to unplug it and wrap it in blankets, or move everything to an insulated cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Zelda Este

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend for a Second Freezer!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this as a second freezer for about 2 months now and it’s just perfect! Energy bills have not gone up at all, easy to adjust the temperature, very quiet, has LOTS of storage space, and doesn’t take up much room in my already small apartment. I did a lot of shopping around for freezers and I can see why this one was by far the most recommended. I would also highly recommend this myself! Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice freezer
customer_reviews.text: Keeps things nice and frozen without the "ice" build up....very quiet as well. I love the locking mechanism because if you have kids you want to limit things such as ice cream or pizza rolls or hot pockets (which most kids will eat out of house and home and quickly) this freezer is perfect and you can control how much they get. A box of ice cream no longer disappears after a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There are too many "cons."
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks and size of this freezer. Unfortunately it has caused an unattractive odor to fill the room in which it is kept. Also. The frost builds up on the freezer very quickly, like weekly after it is removed with the plastic scraper sent with it. The temperature control is on the back which makes it difficult to reach, depending upon where it is located. I would definitely not purchase this freezer again, knowing the above.
customer_reviews.author: Marciaell

customer_reviews.title: Noise level is not acceptable!!
customer_reviews.text: Our unit is so loud, we had to unplug it. Want to return, but company making it difficult. And yes I will jump thru their hoops because this unusable. Update. . .Manufacturer did nothing, however Amazon refunded my money.
customer_reviews.author: Irene T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition, box, packaging and all. Not a dent or blemish anywhere. I let it sit for a day before plugging it in and then after turning it on, just putting in a tray for ice cubes to see how it turns out. Yayee ice cubes! It's super quiet and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Omnipotent Perpetual

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, quiet, holds A LOT!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in 5 days! It holds a LOT, while takin up no more space than a tall microwave would! If you have a hard time bending, I suggest setting it on something to raise it. At the moment, I have 1 loaf of bread, a half gallon of milk, and 53 pounds of meat!!! If I packed the meat to fit better, I'm sure it would hold about 70 lbs! Two removable shelves for taller stuff. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific little freezer, very little ice buildup when level!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great little freezer, works well just like it should. The important thing to avoid this frost build up other purchasers are talking about is IT HAS TO BE LEVEL. Does not matter if you open the door several times during the day. We love this little freezer, great for storing your frozen extra items purchased on sale. On the bottom shelf I placed a plastic rectangular container to place whole chickens in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Whynter CUF-210SS Energy Star 2.1 cu. ft. Stainless Steel Upright Lock Compact Freezer/Refrigerators
product_meta.description:
Color:Stainless Steel| Size:2.1 cu ft| Style:FreezerIdeal for any small space where cold storage is needed, The Whynter 2. 1 cu. Ft. Upright freezer can also be used in the kitchen, offices, garages or basements. This space-saving compact upright freezer is designed with a flush back, allowing it to fit Cleanly against the wall or into corners. The Whynter 2. 1 cu. Ft. Upright freezer features a stainless steel reversible-swing door, adjustable thermostat, two removable shelves and a lock for securing the contents. As an energy Star rated appliance, This upright freezer will help you keep your energy costs down while providing efficient freezing solutions.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Whynter 2.1 cu. ft. upright freezer offers premium quality and innovative design ideal for your needs. Whether for the office, the yacht or home, Whynter 2.1 cu. ft. upright freezer is a centerpiece of any space. This upright freezer comes with two pullout shelves to help keep food items organized and easily accessible, and a lock and key. The premium appeal of the CUF-210SS features an exclusive stainless steel door.
feature_bullets: Energy Star rated (uses less power than a light blub); Low noise level. Perfect for storing breast milk, ice cream and frozen food.
Freestanding setup (clearance around the unit is needed); 2. 1 cu. ft. total storage volume; Product external dimensions: 17. 5″W x 20″ D x 27. 5″ H
Sleek stainless steel reversible swing door; Recessed handle provides a flush finish with the door
Cylinder lock and two keys for added security; Mechanical temperature control -10° – 2°F
Powerful R600a compressor cooling. Two removable flat slide out wire shelves. Freezer internal dimensions- 12.5 W X 16 D X 21 H inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,657 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
